text: The system shall allow users to authenticate using username and password. Authentication must be completed within 30 seconds of submission.
User passwords must be at least 8 characters long and contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, and one number.
After three failed login attempts, the system shall lock the user account for 15 minutes.
The system shall support password reset functionality via email verification. Reset links expire after 24 hours.
All user sessions shall timeout after 30 minutes of inactivity. Users must re-authenticate to continue.
The system shall encrypt all sensitive data using AES-256 encryption before storage.
User data exports shall be available in CSV and Excel formats. Exports must complete within 5 minutes for datasets up to 10,000 records.
